safetyTips: PPE in production, deliveries via Royal Mail.
name: DEBONAIR TEA COMPANY LTD
address: Unit 1, Shrine Barn, Sandling Road, Hythe, CT21 4HE
description: Debonair Tea Company are accredited tea experts based in Kent. We long believed it was possible to make high quality tea more accessible - at an honest price point - and set upon our mission to make exceptional tea a daily pleasure back in 2014.
